channel.title: ml-for-sec on Pwn the world.
channel.description: Recent content in ml-for-sec on Pwn the world.

item.title: Classification of Malware using Static Information
item.description: Static analysis of a PE allows extraction of a lot of metadata that can be useful in further analysis such as names of sections, imported DLLs and strings present which gives an early idea of the functions performed by the binary in question. Malicious binaries with unstructured and improperly formatted metadata (done to achieve sophisticated levels of obfuscation and anti-debugging/anti-reversing defenses) can raise suspicions since a benign PE generally has a well-formed and valid metadata.
